_header: O blessed God that art almighty
_description: A prayer of confession — 94 long lines, generally in couplets

Bod850.First Lines:
Blissed god þat art almiȝtiþou arte ful of goodnesse
                    euer full of mercy…
Bod850.Last Lines:
…That fully what we hope trustelygraunt vs þat graciously
                    Ihesu þat art almiȝti
Bod850.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 217-21.
